Nostradamus was born, Michel, stardom in France in fifty three and he led an extraordinary life.
A Jew who converted to Christianity, he inherited his abilities from the Israelite tribe of Isaac.
He was educated by his grandfathers who were doctors in the court of King Renea of Provence.
Nostradamus went to Montpellier in fifteen twenty one to study medicine and was so successful that he stayed and became a respected teacher.
Now, after his wife and two children died from the plague, he studied and then became an expert on the disease.
He used advanced antiseptics.
He recommended a diet low in fat with plenty of exercise.
A noted astronomer, he deduced that the planets went around the sun even before Copernicus.
Famous for his prophecies, he was persecuted during the Spanish Inquisition for heresy.
